Document.title: Document
Document.description: Represents a safety, health, environment, or quality document.

uploadDate.description: Date when the document was uploaded.

ShePlan.title: ShePlan
ShePlan.description: Represents a Safety, Health, and Environment plan generated by AI.

id.description: Unique identifier for the SHE Plan.

projectName.description: Name of the project the SHE plan is for.

dateGenerated.description: Date when the SHE plan was generated.

planContent.description: The actual content of the generated SHE plan.

Hira.title: Hira
Hira.description: Represents a Hazard Identification and Risk Assessment generated by AI.

assessmentDate.description: Date when the HIRA was conducted.

riskAssessment.description: Detailed risk assessment for the identified hazards.

controlMeasures.description: Control measures suggested to mitigate the risks.

SafeWorkProcedure.title: SafeWorkProcedure
SafeWorkProcedure.description: Represents a Safe Work Procedure generated by AI.

id.description: Unique identifier for the Safe Work Procedure.

taskName.description: Name of the task the procedure is for.

creationDate.description: Date when the procedure was created.

MethodStatement.title: MethodStatement
MethodStatement.description: Represents a Method Statement generated by AI.

id.description: Unique identifier for the Method Statement.

approach.description: Outlines the approach for completing the task safely and efficiently.

dateCreated.description: Date when the method statement was created.

LtirAnalysis.title: LtirAnalysis
LtirAnalysis.description: Represents an LTIR trend analysis generated by AI.

id.description: Unique identifier for the LTIR Analysis.

analysisPeriodStart.description: Start date of the analysis period.

analysisPeriodEnd.description: End date of the analysis period.

trendSummary.description: Summary of the LTIR trends identified.

OhsConsultation.title: OhsConsultation
OhsConsultation.description: Represents OHS Act Consultant (Wilson) AI consultation data.

id.description: Unique identifier for the OHS Consultation.

question.description: The question asked to the AI consultant.

answer.description: The answer provided by the AI consultant.

/documents/{documentId}.description: Stores safety, health, environment, and quality documents.

/users/{userId}/she_plans/{shePlanId}.description: Stores Safety, Health, and Environment plans generated by AI for each user.

/users/{userId}/hiras/{hiraId}.description: Stores Hazard Identification and Risk Assessments generated by AI for each user.

/users/{userId}/safe_work_procedures/{sa.description: Stores Safe Work Procedures generated by AI for each user.

/users/{userId}/method_statements/{metho.description: Stores Method Statements generated by AI for each user.

/users/{userId}/ltir_analyses/{ltirAnaly.description: Stores LTIR trend analyses generated by AI for each user.

/ohs_consultations/{ohsConsultationId}.description: Stores OHS Act Consultant (Wilson) AI consultation data.
